use_cases.case: The genome of Brucella ovis ATCC 25840 chromosome II (NC_009504) was used in a comparitive study of genomes of related Brucella species to identify a probable region of the Brucella ovis genome responsible for veterinary pathogenicity.
The genome of Brucella ovis ATCC 25840 chromosome II (NC_009504) was sequenced and deposited in GenBank as part of this study.
